TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit BitOperations extends System.Object
public ref class BitOperations abstract sealed

Docs.summary: Provides utility methods for intrinsic bit-twiddling operations. The methods use hardware intrinsics when available on the underlying platform; otherwise, they use optimized software fallbacks.

Docs.param: The value to evaluate as being a power of two.
Docs.summary: Evaluates whether the specified value is a power of two.
Docs.returns: if the specified value is a power of two; otherwise.

MemberSignature.Value: public static int LeadingZeroCount (uint value);
.method public static hidebysig int32 LeadingZeroCount(unsigned int32 value) cil managed
Public Shared Function LeadingZeroCount (value As UInteger) As Integer
static member LeadingZeroCount : uint32 -> int
public: static int LeadingZeroCount(System::UInt32 value);

Docs.summary: Counts the number of leading zero bits in an unsigned 32-bit integer mask.
Docs.returns: The number of leading zero bits in a mask.

remarks.format:
### Remarks
This method is similar in behavior to the x86 instruction [LZCNT](xref:System.Runtime.Intrinsics.X86.Lzcnt).

remarks.format:

MemberSignature.Value: public static int Log2 (uint value);
.method public static hidebysig int32 Log2(unsigned int32 value) cil managed
Public Shared Function Log2 (value As UInteger) As Integer
static member Log2 : uint32 -> int
public: static int Log2(System::UInt32 value);

Docs.param: The number from which to obtain the logarithm.
Docs.summary: Returns the integer (floor) log of the specified value, base 2.
Docs.returns: The log of the specified value, base 2.

remarks.format:
### Remarks
Note that by convention, input value 0 returns 0 since Log(0) is undefined.

MemberSignature.Value: public static int PopCount (uint value);
.method public static hidebysig int32 PopCount(unsigned int32 value) cil managed
Public Shared Function PopCount (value As UInteger) As Integer
static member PopCount : uint32 -> int
public: static int PopCount(System::UInt32 value);

Docs.summary: Returns the population count (number of bits set) of a mask.
Docs.returns: The population count of a mask.

remarks.format:
### Remarks
This method is similar in behavior to the x86 instruction [POPCNT](xref:System.Runtime.Intrinsics.X86.Popcnt).

MemberSignature.Value: public static uint RotateLeft (uint value, int offset);
.method public static hidebysig unsigned int32 RotateLeft(unsigned int32 value, int32 offset) cil managed
Public Shared Function RotateLeft (value As UInteger, offset As Integer) As UInteger
static member RotateLeft : uint32 * int -> uint32
public: static System::UInt32 RotateLeft(System::UInt32 value, int offset);

Docs.param: The number of bits to rotate by. Any value outside the range [0..31] is treated as congruent mod 32.
Docs.summary: Rotates the specified value left by the specified number of bits.
Docs.returns: The rotated value.

remarks.format:
### Remarks
This method is similar in behavior to the x86 instruction ROL.

MemberSignature.Value: public static ulong RotateLeft (ulong value, int offset);
.method public static hidebysig unsigned int64 RotateLeft(unsigned int64 value, int32 offset) cil managed
Public Shared Function RotateLeft (value As ULong, offset As Integer) As ULong
static member RotateLeft : uint64 * int -> uint64
public: static System::UInt64 RotateLeft(System::UInt64 value, int offset);

Docs.param: The number of bits to rotate by. Any value outside the range [0..63] is treated as congruent mod 64.
Docs.summary: Rotates the specified value left by the specified number of bits.
Docs.returns: The rotated value.

remarks.format:
### Remarks
This method is similar in behavior to the x86 instruction ROL.

MemberSignature.Value: public static UIntPtr RotateLeft (UIntPtr value, int offset);
.method public static hidebysig native unsigned int RotateLeft(native unsigned int value, int32 offset) cil managed
Public Shared Function RotateLeft (value As UIntPtr, offset As Integer) As UIntPtr
static member RotateLeft : unativeint * int -> unativeint
public: static UIntPtr RotateLeft(UIntPtr value, int offset);

Docs.param: The number of bits to rotate by. Any value outside the range [0..31] is treated as congruent mod 32 on a 32-bit process, and any value outside the range [0..63] is treated as congruent mod 64 on a 64-bit process.
Docs.summary: Rotates the specified value left by the specified number of bits. Similar in behavior to the x86 instruction ROL.
Docs.returns: The rotated value.

remarks.format:
### Remarks
This method is similar in behavior to the x86 instruction ROR.

MemberSignature.Value: public static uint RoundUpToPowerOf2 (uint value);
.method public static hidebysig unsigned int32 RoundUpToPowerOf2(unsigned int32 value) cil managed
Public Shared Function RoundUpToPowerOf2 (value As UInteger) As UInteger
static member RoundUpToPowerOf2 : uint32 -> uint32
public: static System::UInt32 RoundUpToPowerOf2(System::UInt32 value);

Docs.param: The value to round up to a power of two.
Docs.summary: Rounds the specified value up to a power of two.
Docs.returns: The smallest power of two that's greater than or equal to . If is 0 or the result overflows, returns 0.

The smallest power of two that's greater than or equal to .

MemberSignature.Value: public static int TrailingZeroCount (int value);
.method public static hidebysig int32 TrailingZeroCount(int32 value) cil managed
Public Shared Function TrailingZeroCount (value As Integer) As Integer

public: static int TrailingZeroCount(int value);

Docs.summary: Counts the number of trailing zero bits in an 32-bit integer value mask.
Docs.returns: The number of trailing zero bits in the integer value.

remarks.format:
### Remarks
This method is similar in behavior to the x86 instruction TZCNT.
